name: mqtt-board
description: Client based on MQTT.js and Vue.js
author: Sergey Buntsevich <scarry92@yandex.ru>

scripts.deploy: quasar build -m spa && mkdir -p deploy && cp -R dist/spa/* misc LICENSE package.json README.md deploy && node_modules/git-directory-deploy/bin/git-directory-deploy.sh -ddeploy -bgh-pages -rhttps://git.gurtam.net/flespi/frontend/mqtt-board.git && rm -rf deploy && git push github gh-pages
